info: The proposed results-based lending (RBL) program will support the Government of Sri Lanka in equitably developing its human capital base in order to meet the objectives of the Mahinda Chintana: Vision for the Future  and the National Human Resources and Employment Policy (NHREP) for Sri Lanka.  The proposed program will support the government's Education Sector Development Framework and Program (ESDFP), which seeks to transform the school education system to create a human capital foundation for a knowledge economy.  It builds on the extensive experience of the Asian Development Bank (ADB) in Sri Lanka's education sector.
name: RBL: EDUCATION SECTOR DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM
